source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第四十三
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra, Vol. 43

source_sentence: 三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯

source_sentence: 初分譬喻品第十一之二
translation: Eleventh and Second of the First Part of the Parables

source_sentence: 「善現！

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀四念住常無常相不可得，觀四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住樂苦相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住我無我相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住淨不淨相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住空不空相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住無相有相相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住無願有願相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住遠離不遠離相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支遠離不遠離相不可得。
translation: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀四念住常無常相不可得，觀四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住樂苦相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住我無我相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住淨不淨相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住空不空相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住無相有相相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住無願有願相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀四念住遠離不遠離相不可得，觀四正斷乃至八聖道支遠離不遠離相不可得。

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well-present!

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom, he has the skillful means to hear and teach the profound perfection of wisdom like this, and his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門常無常相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門樂苦相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門我無我相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門淨不淨相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門空不空相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門無相有相相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門無願有願相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門遠離不遠離相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門遠離不遠離相不可得。
translation: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門常無常相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門樂苦相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門我無我相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門淨不淨相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門空不空相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門無相有相相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門無願有願相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀空解脫門遠離不遠離相不可得，觀無相、無願解脫門遠離不遠離相不可得。

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well-present!

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom, he has the skillful means to hear and teach the profound perfection of wisdom like this, and his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多常無常相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多樂苦相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多我無我相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多淨不淨相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多空不空相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多無相有相相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多無願有願相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多遠離不遠離相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多遠離不遠離相不可得。
translation: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多常無常相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多樂苦相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多我無我相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多淨不淨相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多空不空相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多無相有相相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多無願有願相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀布施波羅蜜多遠離不遠離相不可得，觀淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多遠離不遠離相不可得。

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀五眼常無常相不可得，觀六神通常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼樂苦相不可得，觀六神通樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼我無我相不可得，觀六神通我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼淨不淨相不可得，觀六神通淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼空不空相不可得，觀六神通空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼無相有相相不可得，觀六神通無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼無願有願相不可得，觀六神通無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀六神通寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼遠離不遠離相不可得，觀六神通遠離不遠離相不可得。
translation: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀五眼常無常相不可得，觀六神通常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼樂苦相不可得，觀六神通樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼我無我相不可得，觀六神通我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼淨不淨相不可得，觀六神通淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼空不空相不可得，觀六神通空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼無相有相相不可得，觀六神通無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼無願有願相不可得，觀六神通無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀六神通寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀五眼遠離不遠離相不可得，觀六神通遠離不遠離相不可得。

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done!

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom, he has the skillful means to hear and teach the profound perfection of wisdom like this, and his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀佛十力常無常相不可得，觀四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法、一切智、道相智、一切相智常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力樂苦相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力我無我相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力淨不淨相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力空不空相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力無相有相相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力無願有願相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力遠離不遠離相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智遠離不遠離相不可得。
translation: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀佛十力常無常相不可得，觀四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法、一切智、道相智、一切相智常無常相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力樂苦相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智樂苦相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力我無我相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智我無我相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力淨不淨相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智淨不淨相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力空不空相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智空不空相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力無相有相相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智無相有相相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力無願有願相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智無願有願相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力寂靜不寂靜相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智寂靜不寂靜相不可得；以應一切智智心，觀佛十力遠離不遠離相不可得，觀四無所畏乃至一切相智遠離不遠離相不可得。

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well-present!

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom, he has the skillful means to hear and teach the profound perfection of wisdom like this, and his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩作此觀時，復興是念：『我當以無所得為方便，為諸有情說一切法常無常相不可得、樂苦相不可得、我無我相不可得、淨不淨相不可得、空不空相不可得、無相有相相不可得、無願有願相不可得、寂靜不寂靜相不可得、遠離不遠離相不可得。』
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva makes this observation, he again thinks, 'By the method of attaining nothing, I will explain for sentient beings that the characteristic of permanence and impermanence of all things is unobtainable, the characteristic of pleasure and pain is unobtainable, the characteristic of selflessness is unobtainable, the characteristic of purity and impurity is unobtainable, the characteristic of emptiness and non-emptyness is unobtainable, the characteristic of formlessness and form is unobtainable, the characteristic of wishlessness and wishing is unobtainable, the characteristic of quiescence and non-quiescence is unobtainable, and the characteristic of remoteness and non-separation is unobtainable.'

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，無所著布施波羅蜜多。
translation: "This is the perfection of giving without attachment when a bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of prajñā.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩由此布施波羅蜜多，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva thus gives the perfection of generosity and has skillful means, his mind isn't startled or frightened when he hears about such profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，不以應聲聞、獨覺心，觀一切法常無常相不可得、樂苦相不可得、我無我相不可得、淨不淨相不可得、空不空相不可得、無相有相相不可得、無願有願相不可得、寂靜不寂靜相不可得、遠離不遠離相不可得，以無所得為方便故。
translation: "If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and solitary realizers don't observe, with the minds of śrāvakas and solitary realizers, that the characteristic of permanence and impermanence, the characteristic of pleasure and pain, the characteristic of selflessness, the characteristic of purity and impurity, the characteristic of emptiness and nonemptyness, the characteristic of formlessness and formlessness, the characteristic of wishlessness and wishing, the characteristic of quiescence and nonquiescence, and the characteristic of remoteness and nonseparation of all things are unobtainable when they practice the perfection of wisdom, then they use the method of obtaining nothing as the method.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well-present!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，無所著淨戒波羅蜜多。
translation: "This is the perfection of pure morality that the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas cultivate when they're practicing prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩由此淨戒波羅蜜多，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva thus practices the perfection of pure precepts and has skillful means, his mind isn't startled or frightened when he hears about the profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以無所得為方便，觀一切法常無常相不可得、樂苦相不可得、我無我相不可得、淨不淨相不可得、空不空相不可得、無相有相相不可得、無願有願相不可得、寂靜不寂靜相不可得、遠離不遠離相不可得，能於是中安忍欲樂。
translation: If bodhisattvas, when they practice the perfection of wisdom, use the method of attaining nothing to observe that the characteristic of permanence and impermanence, the characteristic of pleasure and pain, the characteristic of selflessness, the characteristic of purity and impurity, the characteristic of emptiness and non-emptyness, the characteristic of formlessness and formlessness, the characteristic of wishlessness and wishing, the characteristic of quiescence and non-quiescence, and the characteristic of remoteness and non-freedom are unobtainable, they can tolerate their desires and pleasures in this way.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well-present!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，無所著安忍波羅蜜多。
translation: "This is the perfection of patience that the bodhisattva Mahāsattva has no attachment to when he cultivates the perfection of prajñā.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩由此安忍波羅蜜多，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva thus practices the perfection of patience and has skillful means, his mind isn't startled, frightened, or terrified when he hears about the profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，以應一切智智心，觀一切法常無常相不可得、樂苦相不可得、我無我相不可得、淨不淨相不可得、空不空相不可得、無相有相相不可得、無願有願相不可得、寂靜不寂靜相不可得、遠離不遠離相不可得，雖以無所得為方便，而常不捨一切智智相應作意。
translation: "If a bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom and observes with the mind of omniscience that the characteristic of permanence and impermanence, the characteristic of pleasure and pain, the characteristic of selflessness, the characteristic of purity and impurity, the characteristic of emptiness and nonemptyness, the characteristic of form without form, the characteristic of wish without wish, the characteristic of quiescence and nonquiescence, and the characteristic of remoteness and nonseparation are unobtainable, then even though he uses the method of obtaining nothing as a method, he always refrains from abandoning the contemplation associated with omniscience.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，無所著精進波羅蜜多。
translation: "This is the perfection of effort without attachment when a bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of prajñā.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩由此精進波羅蜜多，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva thus makes effort with the perfection of effort and has skillful means, his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified when he hears about such profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，不以應聲聞、獨覺心，觀一切法常無常相不可得、樂苦相不可得、我無我相不可得、淨不淨相不可得、空不空相不可得、無相有相相不可得、無願有願相不可得、寂靜不寂靜相不可得、遠離不遠離相不可得，以無所得為方便故，於中不起應聲聞、獨覺心及餘非善心而為散動。
translation: "If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and solitary realizers don't observe with the minds of śrāvakas and solitary realizers that the characteristic of permanence and impermanence, the characteristic of pleasure and pain, the characteristic of self and selflessness, the characteristic of purity and impurity, the characteristic of emptiness and non-emptyness, the characteristic of formlessness and formlessness, the characteristic of wishlessness and wishing, the characteristic of quiescence and non-quiescence, and the characteristic of remoteness and non-separation are unobtainable when they practice the perfection of wisdom, then they won't distract śrāvakas, solitary realizers, or other unwholesome minds with the method of attaining nothing.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，無所著靜慮波羅蜜多。
translation: "This is the perfection of concentration without attachment when a bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of prajñā.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩由此靜慮波羅蜜多，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva thus practices the perfection of concentration and has skillful means, his mind isn't startled, frightened, or terrified when he hears about the profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，作如是觀：『非空色故色空，色即是空，空即是色，受、想、行、識亦復如是。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom, he observes in this way, 'Form is empty because it's not empty of form, form is empty, and empty is form, and so are feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 非空眼處故眼處空，眼處即是空，空即是眼處，耳、鼻、舌、身、意處亦復如是。
translation: The sense-field of the eye is empty because the sense-field of the eye isn't empty, the sense-field of the eye is empty, and emptiness is the sense-field of the eye, and so are the sense-fields of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

source_sentence: 非空色處故色處空，色處即是空，空即是色處，聲、香、味、觸、法處亦復如是。
translation: Because the sense-field isn't empty, the sense-field is empty, and emptiness is the sense-field; the sense-field of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are likewise.

source_sentence: 非空眼界故眼界空，眼界即是空，空即是眼界，色界、眼識界及眼觸、眼觸為緣所生諸受亦復如是。
translation: Because the eye realm is not empty, the eye realm is empty, and emptiness is the eye realm, and so are the form realm, the eye consciousness realm, and the sensations that arise from eye contact and eye contact as perceptual objects.

source_sentence: 非空耳界故耳界空，耳界即是空，空即是耳界，聲界、耳識界及耳觸、耳觸為緣所生諸受亦復如是。
translation: The ear realm is empty because it's not empty of the ear realm, the ear realm is empty, and emptiness is the ear realm, and so are the sound realm, the ear-consciousness realm, and the sensations that arise from ear-contact and ear-contact as perceptual objects.

source_sentence: 非空鼻界故鼻界空，鼻界即是空，空即是鼻界，香界、鼻識界及鼻觸、鼻觸為緣所生諸受亦復如是。
translation: The nose realm is empty because it's not empty of the nose realm, the nose realm is empty, and emptiness is the nose realm, and so are the fragrance realm, the nasal consciousness realm, and the sensations that arise from nasal contact and nasal contact as perceptual objects.

source_sentence: 非空舌界故舌界空，舌界即是空，空即是舌界，味界、舌識界及舌觸、舌觸為緣所生諸受亦復如是。
translation: The tongue realm is empty because it's not empty of the tongue realm, the tongue realm is empty, and emptiness is the tongue realm, and so are the taste realm, the tongue-consciousness realm, and the sensations that arise from tongue-contact and tongue-touch as perceptual objects.

source_sentence: 非空身界故身界空，身界即是空，空即是身界，觸界、身識界及身觸、身觸為緣所生諸受亦復如是。
translation: The body realm is empty because it's not empty of the body realm, the body realm is empty, and emptiness is the body realm, and so are the contact realm, the body-consciousness realm, and the sensations that arise from body contact and body contact as perceptual objects.

source_sentence: 非空意界故意界空，意界即是空，空即是意界，法界、意識界及意觸、意觸為緣所生諸受亦復如是。
translation: The mind realm is not empty; the mental realm is empty because the mind realm is empty, and emptiness is the mental realm, and so are the Dharma realm, the consciousness realm, and the sensations that arise from mental contact and mental contact as perceptual objects.

source_sentence: 非空地界故地界空，地界即是空，空即是地界，水、火、風、空、識界亦復如是。
translation: Because the mind realm is not empty, the mental realm is empty, and emptiness is the mental realm, and so are the realms of water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 非空苦聖諦故，苦聖諦空，苦聖諦即是空，空即是苦聖諦，集、滅、道聖諦亦復如是。
translation: Because it's not empty of the noble truth of suffering, the noble truth of suffering is empty, and emptiness is the noble truth of suffering; the noble truths of arising, ceasing, and the path are likewise.

source_sentence: 非空無明故無明空，無明即是空，空即是無明，行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱亦復如是。
translation: Not being empty of ignorance, it follows that ignorance is empty, ignorance is emptiness, and emptiness is ignorance, and so are formations, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, contact, sensation, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, old age, grief, pain, and sorrow.

source_sentence: 非空四靜慮故四靜慮空，四靜慮即是空，空即是四靜慮，四無量、四無色定亦復如是。
translation: Because the four meditations aren't empty, the four meditations are empty, and because the four meditations are empty, emptiness is the four meditations, and the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations are likewise.

source_sentence: 非空四念住故四念住空，四念住即是空，空即是四念住，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支亦復如是。
translation: Because the four abodes of mindfulness are not empty, the four abodes of mindfulness are empty, and emptiness is the four abodes of mindfulness, as are the four correct eliminations, the four miraculous powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and the eight noble factors of the path.

source_sentence: 非空空解脫門故空解脫門空，空解脫門即是空，空即是空解脫門，無相、無願解脫門亦復如是。
translation: The liberation gate of emptiness that's not empty is the liberation gate of emptiness, the liberation gate of emptiness is emptiness, emptiness is the liberation gate of emptiness, and the liberation gate of no characteristics and no wishes is likewise.

source_sentence: 非空布施波羅蜜多故布施波羅蜜多空，布施波羅蜜多即是空，空即是布施波羅蜜多，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多亦復如是。
translation: The perfection of generosity is empty because the perfection of generosity isn't empty, the perfection of generosity is empty, and emptiness is the perfection of generosity, and so are the perfections of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 非空五眼故五眼空，五眼即是空，空即是五眼，六神通亦復如是。
translation: It's not that the five eyes are empty because the five eyes are empty, the five eyes are empty, emptiness is the five eyes, and the six supernormal powers are likewise.

source_sentence: 非空佛十力故佛十力空，佛十力即是空，空即是佛十力，四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法、一切智、道相智、一切相智亦復如是。』
translation: It's not empty of the Buddha's ten powers; therefore, the Buddha's ten powers are empty, and emptiness is the Buddha's ten powers, and so are the four fearlessnesses, the four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, the 18 uncommon dharmas of the Buddha, omniscience, knowledge of the path, and knowledge of all characteristics.'

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Vairocana!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，無所著般若波羅蜜多。
translation: This is the practice of the perfection of wisdom by a bodhisattva-mahāsattva when he's cultivating the perfection of wisdom, and he has no attachment to the perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩由此般若波羅蜜多，有方便善巧故，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。」
translation: Thus, when the bodhisattva Mahāsattva thus practices the perfection of wisdom and has skillful means, his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified when he hears about such profound perfections of wisdom."

source_sentence: 爾時，善現白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the good manifestation said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，為諸善友之所攝受，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖？」
translation: How is it that when a bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom and is taken in by good friends who hear and teach such profound perfections of wisdom, his mind isn't startled, afraid, or terrified?"

source_sentence: 佛告善現：「諸菩薩摩訶薩善友者，謂若能以無所得為方便，說色常無常相不可得，說受、想、行、識常無常相不可得；說色樂苦相不可得，說受、想、行、識樂苦相不可得；說色我無我相不可得，說受、想、行、識我無我相不可得；說色淨不淨相不可得，說受、想、行、識淨不淨相不可得；說色空不空相不可得，說受、想、行、識空不空相不可得；說色無相有相相不可得，說受、想、行、識無相有相相不可得；說色無願有願相不可得，說受、想、行、識無願有願相不可得；說色寂靜不寂靜相不可得，說受、想、行、識寂靜不寂靜相不可得；說色遠離不遠離相不可得，說受、想、行、識遠離不遠離相不可得，及勸依此法勤修善根，不令迴向聲聞、獨覺，唯令證得一切智智。
translation: 佛告善現：「諸菩薩摩訶薩善友者，謂若能以無所得為方便，說色常無常相不可得，說受、想、行、識常無常相不可得；說色樂苦相不可得，說受、想、行、識樂苦相不可得；說色我無我相不可得，說受、想、行、識我無我相不可得；說色淨不淨相不可得，說受、想、行、識淨不淨相不可得；說色空不空相不可得，說受、想、行、識空不空相不可得；說色無相有相相不可得，說受、想、行、識無相有相相不可得；說色無願有願相不可得，說受、想、行、識無願有願相不可得；說色寂靜不寂靜相不可得，說受、想、行、識寂靜不寂靜相不可得；說色遠離不遠離相不可得，說受、想、行、識遠離不遠離相不可得，及勸依此法勤修善根，不令迴向聲聞、獨覺，唯令證得一切智智。

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, sir!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩善友。
translation: "This is a good friend of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，為此善友之所攝受，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom and is taken in by this good friend, his mind isn't startled or frightened when he hears and teaches the perfection of wisdom in such a profound way.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good man!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩善友者，謂若能以無所得為方便，說眼處常無常相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處常無常相不可得；說眼處樂苦相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處樂苦相不可得；說眼處我無我相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處我無我相不可得；說眼處淨不淨相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處淨不淨相不可得；說眼處空不空相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處空不空相不可得；說眼處無相有相相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無相有相相不可得；說眼處無願有願相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無願有願相不可得；說眼處寂靜不寂靜相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處寂靜不寂靜相不可得；說眼處遠離不遠離相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處遠離不遠離相不可得，及勸依此法勤修善根，不令迴向聲聞、獨覺，唯令證得一切智智。
translation: 諸菩薩摩訶薩善友者，謂若能以無所得為方便，說眼處常無常相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處常無常相不可得；說眼處樂苦相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處樂苦相不可得；說眼處我無我相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處我無我相不可得；說眼處淨不淨相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處淨不淨相不可得；說眼處空不空相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處空不空相不可得；說眼處無相有相相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無相有相相不可得；說眼處無願有願相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無願有願相不可得；說眼處寂靜不寂靜相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處寂靜不寂靜相不可得；說眼處遠離不遠離相不可得，說耳、鼻、舌、身、意處遠離不遠離相不可得，及勸依此法勤修善根，不令迴向聲聞、獨覺，唯令證得一切智智。

translation: Well done, sir!

source_sentence: 是為菩薩摩訶薩善友。
translation: "This is a good friend of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，為此善友之所攝受，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of wisdom and is taken in by this good friend, his mind isn't startled or frightened when he hears and teaches the perfection of wisdom in such a profound way.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩善友者，謂若能以無所得為方便，說色處常無常相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處常無常相不可得；說色處樂苦相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處樂苦相不可得；說色處我無我相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處我無我相不可得；說色處淨不淨相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處淨不淨相不可得；說色處空不空相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處空不空相不可得；說色處無相有相相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處無相有相相不可得；說色處無願有願相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處無願有願相不可得；說色處寂靜不寂靜相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處寂靜不寂靜相不可得；說色處遠離不遠離相不可得，說聲、香、味、觸、法處遠離不遠離相不可得，及勸依此法勤修善根，不令迴向聲聞、獨覺，唯令證得一切智智。
